casebody.data:
BARTS
v.
EASLEY AND MANN. No. 256P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 16, 2006. William P. Hart, Senior Deputy Attorney General, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 9th day of May 2006 by Plaintiff for Discretionary Review by the Supreme Court:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 16th day of November 2006."
